resources.string: Excuse yourself from all the hassle. We recommend you select Google Login to use your Google Account.
This account is already logged in somewhere. The information regarding previous log in mentioned below.
Do you want to log out of all previous sessions and login this one instead?
In case you are seeing this, the questions have not been loaded due to some reason. Please log out of your account, close & reopen this app and check if this resolves the problem.
Enter your answer to this question
You must ensure absolutely correct spellings. Please Google them as required.

Questions and Answers: Here are some things you must keep in mind before starting the quiz.

• The marks for correct and wrong answers and shown in the question itself. Pay attention.
• Click on "Matrix" to view answered & unanswered questions.
• In case you are logged out for any reason, don't panic- You can login again and start from where you have left.
• Quiz master is always right! 
• The server might stop responding at times and the page might throw an error. You can close and reopen the app to continue.

Here are some examples of acceptable submissions in case the answer is Mahatma Gandhi. (Two worded Answer)
• mahatma gandhi: Most acceptable answer.
• MAHATMA GANDHI: Acceptable answer.
• Mohandas karamchand Gandhi:Not acceptable answer (two worded is mentioned)
• MK Gandhi: Not an acceptable answer.

Results for this contest will be announced soon after the end of the quiz.
• In case the participants score equal points, they will be sorted in order of increasing time. That is, the person attaining the point in least time will be ahead in points table.
• Correct Answers will be announced after the end of the quiz.
• In case you believe that your correct answer has been marked as incorrect, you are free to contact us at support@qfrat.co.in with Subject- "Marking error". We will revert back to you shortly.
I have read all terms and condition and agree to abide by them
Select the quiz you wish to play

You are already signed in, do you want to sign out instead?
QFrat is the Quizzing fraternity dedicated to community quizzing across all genres.\nStarted in 2010 in KNIT Sultanpur, QFrat is one of the prime quizzing community in the northern Indian region.
You may experience unexpected issues which will be rectified as soon as we find it.
Thank you for your participation. Hope you found this quiz informative, challenging and useful.\nPlease note: The results will be sent to your registered email IDs along with social media. Stay tuned
